hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Requiem of Spirit#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #the Prelude of Light#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Kokiri Sword# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Left

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Sun's Song#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Requiem of Spirit#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple Boss Key# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #3# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Upper Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Water Temple Compass#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the true reward is the friends we made along the way.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold respectively...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple MQ GS Sun Block Room

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Water Temple Compass#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Tower#.
